hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT INTH_ID, HEAD_ID, INVBILLNO, IMS_INVBILLNO, INVBILLNO_TYPE, ORDER_TYPE, ORGANIZATION_ID, ENTNAME, CUSTOMER_CODE, CUSTOMER_NAME, TAKE_MAN, PHONE_CODE, ADDRESS1, SHIPMODE_ID, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY, CITY_NAME, AREA, AREA_NAME, STREET, STREET_NAME, WAREHOUSE_CODE, WAREHOUSE_NAME, AUDITING_DATE, CREATION_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, APPFALG, UPDATE_FLAG, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_CREATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AMOUNT, NOTE, WH_ID, IS_COLLECT_MONEY, PAYMENT_TYPE, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, AREA_NAME_CODE, IS_PRINT_PRICE, FEEDBACK_FLAG, EDIERRINFO FROM INTEF_CCS_SO_ORDER WHERE 1=1 <<AND INTH_ID LIKE :inthId>> <<AND HEAD_ID LIKE :headId>> <<AND INVBILLNO LIKE :invbillno>> <<AND IMS_INVBILLNO LIKE :imsInvbillno>> <<AND INVBILLNO_TYPE LIKE :invbillnoType>> <<AND ORDER_TYPE LIKE :orderType>> <<AND ORGANIZATION_ID LIKE :organizationId>> <<AND ENTNAME LIKE :entname>> <<AND CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :customerCode>> <<AND CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE :customerName>> <<AND TAKE_MAN LIKE :takeMan>> <<AND PHONE_CODE LIKE :phoneCode>> <<AND ADDRESS1 LIKE :address1>> <<AND SHIPMODE_ID LIKE :shipmodeId>> <<AND PROVINCE LIKE :province>> <<AND PROVINCE_NAME LIKE :provinceName>> <<AND CITY LIKE :city>> <<AND CITY_NAME LIKE :cityName>> <<AND AREA LIKE :area>> <<AND AREA_NAME LIKE :areaName>> <<AND STREET LIKE :street>> <<AND STREET_NAME LIKE :streetName>> <<AND WAREHOUSE_CODE LIKE :warehouseCode>> <<AND WAREHOUSE_NAME LIKE :warehouseName>> <<AND AUDITING_DATE > :auditingDateFrom>> <<AND AUDITING_DATE <= :auditingDateTo + 1>> <<AND CREATION_DATE > :creationDateFrom>> <<AND CREATION_DATE <= :creationDateTo + 1>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE1 LIKE :attribute1>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE2 LIKE :attribute2>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE3 LIKE :attribute3>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE4 LIKE :attribute4>> <<AND ATTRIBUTE5 LIKE :attribute5>> <<AND APPFALG LIKE :appfalg>> <<AND UPDATE_FLAG LIKE :updateFlag>> <<AND CREATE_BY LIKE :createBy>> <<AND CREATE_DATE > :createDateFrom>> <<AND CREATE_DATE <= :createDateTo + 1>> <<AND LAST_CREATE_BY LIKE :lastCreateBy>> <<AND LAST_UPDATE_DATE > :lastUpdateDateFrom>> <<AND LAST_UPDATE_DATE <= :lastUpdateDateTo + 1>> <<AND AMOUNT LIKE :amount>> <<AND NOTE LIKE :note>> <<AND WH_ID LIKE :whId>> <<AND IS_COLLECT_MONEY LIKE :isCollectMoney>> <<AND PAYMENT_TYPE LIKE :paymentType>> <<AND ORG_CODE LIKE :orgCode>> <<AND ORG_NAME LIKE :orgName>> <<AND AREA_NAME_CODE LIKE :areaNameCode>> <<AND IS_PRINT_PRICE LIKE :isPrintPrice>> <<AND FEEDBACK_FLAG LIKE :feedbackFlag>> <<AND EDIERRINFO LIKE :edierrinfo>> order by CREATION_DATE desc
